issue.title: [Docs] Mention PYARROW_PARALLEL in Python dev docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16760](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16760). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should include `PYARROW_PARALLEL` in the Python developer docs.

comments.body:
